page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I LIVE WITH MY AUNTIE IN A SMALL TERRACED HOUSE IN KIRBY CROSS. I HAVE ONE SISTER, DONNA. I AM 12 YEARS OLD. EVERY WEEKDAY MORNING I GET UP AT 07.00 AND GET DRESSED IN MY BLACK AND GOLD SCHOOL UNIFORM. I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. I USUALLY EAT CORNFLAKES AND DRINK ORANGE JUICE. I WATCH BREAKFAST T.V. I GO BACK UPSTAIRS, WASH AND BRUSH MY TEETH. I GET MY BOOKS READY FOR SCHOOL. I COLLECT MY 0.50P DINNER MONEY AND GO TO GET THE COACH AT 08.45. I ARRIVE IN SCHOOL AT 09.00. I WANDER ROUND UNTIL THE BELL GOES AT 9.20.ONE DAY'S LESSONS AFTER REGISTRATION, ARE MATHS,PASTORAL AND SOCIAL,DRAMA, ENGLISH AND ART. AT LUNCH TIME I BOUGHT SOME CRISPS AND A SCONE. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 15.35. I GO HOME BY COACH. I HAVE MY TEA, CHIPS AND A PIE. I DO HOMEWORK AND VISIT FRIENDS.
